column3: FRENCH

column6: SPANISH

column2: Our revered ancestors fought to forge a world shaped in their image and shed their blood on the altar of their sacred cause. Their ancient exploits are nothing but legend now, and a great darkness has descended upon the realms of Man. Where are the titans of old now? Where is Alexandros, where is Seleukos, where is Kurus, where is Caesar? Can you remember their deeds and make their spectres bow their heads before you, in approval of your mighty leadership? Can you unite the bickering, warring realms of Man and forge an Empire as the world has never seen? Can you be the Restorer of the Realm of Light and banish the Darkness? Lux Invicta!
As the Roman [Root.GetTitle], the Imperial City should be yours to rule.
column3: En tant que [Root.GetTitle] romain, vous devriez régner sur la Cité impériale.
column4: Als römischer [Root.GetTitle] sollte die kaiserliche Stadt durch Euch regiert werden.
column6: Como el romano [Root.GetTitle], la Ciudad Imperial debe ser tuya y tú debes gobernarla.

column2: As the rightful representative of the deified Emperors on Earth, it is your duty to take charge of the Imperial City and restore their place of honor there.
As the rightful representative of the deified Emperors on Earth, it is your duty to take charge of the Imperial City and restore their place of honor there.
Dissatisfied with the Court Calligrapher's poor work.

column2: These laws control the size of the levies that vassal religious lords are formally obliged to provide their secular liege.
column3: Ces lois déterminent les effectifs militaires que les vassaux ecclésiastiques sont tenus de mettre à la disposition de leur suzerain séculaire.
column4: Diese Gesetze regeln die Größe der Wehrpflichtigenkontingente, die kirchliche Vasallen formell ihrem säkularen Lehnsherrn zur Verfügung stellen müssen.
column6: Estas leyes controlan el tamaño de las levas que los pontífices vasallos están obligados a proporcionar al señor seglar.

column4: Kirchenvasallen zahlen ihrem säkularen Lehnsherrn beträchtliche Zehnten - es sei denn, sie mögen das Oberhaupt ihrer Religion mehr!
column6: En teoría, los vasallos de la Iglesia proporcionan a su señor seglar un diezmo significativo, ¡a no ser que prefieran a su líder espiritual!

Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
As your liege, I request and require that you convert to the True Faith, [FromFrom.Religion.GetName].

[FromFrom.GetBestName]
I will submit to your will.
I have decided to free [From.GetTitledName] from the slave pits of [From.Host.GetTitledName]. It will take time - and likely some gold - but [From.GetFirstName] deserves a better fate!
column3: J'ai décidé de libérer [From.GetTitledName] des donjons de [From.Host.GetTitledName]. Cela prendra du temps, et sûrement un peu d'or, mais [From.GetFirstName] ne mérite pas un tel sort !
column4: Ich habe beschlossen, [From.GetTitledName] aus dem Kerker von [From.Host.GetTitledName] zu befreien. Das wird etwas Zeit in Anspruch nehmen  und wahrscheinlich auch etwas Gold  aber [From.GetFirstName] verdient ein besseres Schicksal!
column6: He decidido liberar a [From.GetTitledName] de las mazmorras de [From.Host.GetTitledName]. Tomará tiempo - y probablemente un poco de oro- pero [From.GetFirstName] merece un destino destino.
